fields.physical_description:
1. helmet; THE LIFE GUARDS; 34055; silver coloured plastic with gold trim and elastic chin strap. The plume is missing. 
2. helmet; 17TH/21ST LANCERS; 34056; white and black plastic with off white plume; silver and gold trim and elastic chin strap. Still in original plastic bag marked Made in Hong Kong 
3. helmet; THE BLUES AND ROYALS; 34148; opaque plastic with gold trim and chin strap; red plume. 
4. beret; moulded black plastic with silver insignia; SOLDIER. Contained in plastic bag with green approval label - Code No. DC2557; Approved by Robert Brechin; 4.2.83. 
5. beret; moulded mid green plastic with silver insignia; SOLDIER. 
6. beret; moulded olive green plastic with 'gold' insignia; possibly TANK COMMANDER 
7. beret; moulded red plastic with silver insignia; PARACHUTE REGIMENT. 
8. beret; moulded light blue plastic with paper insignia. UN BERET. 
9. beret; moulded black plastic. FRENCH RESISTANCE FIGHTER 
10. beret; moulded dark blue plastic. It is possible that this is a French Resistance Beret or a prototype for another style. It has a deep front area with a shield shaped insignia showing a star and simple crown. 
11. knitted hat; moulded black plastic. SABOUTAGE; 34118.
12. knitted hat prototype as 11; but larger and more solid plastic. 
13. RAF CAP; moulded grey plastic with gold insignia. Contained in plastic bag with green approval label. 
14. cap; British Army Officer; 34137. moulded brown with red and black plastic; silver insignia. 
15. cap; Royal Military Police; 34138; moulded red with black plastic; silver insignia. 
16. cap; The Royal Hussars; silver insignia shows Prince of Wales' feathers. moulded purple with black and red plastic.
17. cap group; SAS; moulded black with red plastic; silver insignia. Two cap samples containing in plastic bag with the moulded castings in black plastic of the insignia. Some of these are still in place. 
18. cap; German Officer; moulded dark green with black and silver plastic. 
19. cap; German Officer; as (18) but sprayed beige to change it for use in the desert campaign. THIS IS A SAMPLE and not well sprayed. 
20. cap; German Desert Commander; beige plastic with white trim 
21. cap; large and flat; white plastic with black  - milkman's cap?
22. kepi; FRENCH FOREIGN LEGION 34143; khaki plastic 
23. kepi; FRENCH FOREIGN LEGION 34143; olive green plastic 
24. kepi cover; FRENCH FOREIGN LEGION 34143; white cotton 
25. RCMP; Canadian Mountie wide brimmed hat; cream plastic with tan coloured hat band. 
26. pith helmet; cream plastic 
27. Australian wide brimmed hat with side pinned up; greyish plastic with tan hat band 
28. hat; JUNGLE EXPLORER 35005; cream cotton with black and white hat band 
29. cap; American Civil War; dark blue with black plastic; gold insignia 30. cap; American Civil War; purple with black plastic; gold insignia 
31. Fireman's helmet; yellow plastic; gold insignia black; chin strap 
32. Fireman's helmet with deep neck plate; yellow plastic
33. note with (31 and 32) - FIREMEN'S HELMETS FROM C.K.I. 

APPROVED SAMPLES W.A.G.PUGH 1.11.77 
34. helmet; moulded plastic in original paper and contained in plastic bag marked PT# 112334.02 #8101 JAP HELMET 10272 PCS-6DO1 3264 PCS-7CO1 13536 PCS TOTAL 
35. helmet; moulded grey plastic plastic in original paper and contained in plastic bag marked PT# 112328.05 #8100 (or 8106) 6336 PCS 7CO1. This is a German helmet 
36. helmet; GERMAN STORMTROOPER; grey plastic with paper flashes on each side and black elastic chin strap 
37. helmet; US; olive green plastic with skull and crossbones insignia and black elastic chin strap 
38. helmet; US GI; olive green plastic with beige plastic chin strap 
39. helmet; British 2nd World War; khaki plastic with green elastic chin strap. Marked HASBRO HONG KONG
40. helmet netting; green nylon with elastic edging (over 39) 
41. helmet; modern British broken image style; moulded khaki plastic 42. pilot's helmet; khaki plastic with black chin strap 
43. SAS helmet; black plastic with face mask; green movable visor and insignia on the back 
44. Helicopter pilot helmet; olive green with black face mask; built in movable green visor; foam rubber ear pads. 
45. ROYAL MARINE helmet; orange plastic with black trim and chin strap; foam rubber pad at top 
46. Mountain Rescue helmet; orange plastic with black chin strap 
47. Crash helmet; metallic blue plastic with clear movable visor 
48. Motorcycle Police Crash Helmet; white plastic with green movable visor; blue and white paper trim and name 
49. crash helmet; in original paper and contained in plastic bag marked PT#115910-00 CRASH HELMET 21000 PCS 7DO1 
50. crash helmet; white plastic similar to (49) 
51. SPECIAL TEAM 1982; 1983 helmet; dark grey moulded plastic with clear visor; eagle head insignia 
52. Space helmet; of a type worn by astronauts; moulded white plastic with black; silver and red trim 
53. insignia; gold coloured metal with red marking 
54. green approval label marked TWO TYPES OF U.S. HELMET ONE WITH PIP FOR U.S. MARINE. WITHOUT PIP FOR U.S. PARATROOPER 19/4/79.  This may refer to (37 and 38).
fields.title: Hats and Headdresses
